sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from "react"; import OnboardingSideBar from "../components/OnboardingSideBar"; import {useForm} from "react-hook-form"; const Employment = (props: any) =>{ const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false) const { register, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm(); const onSubmit =(data : any)=>{ setSubmitted(true); setTimeout( function() { setSubmitted(false ); props.history.push('/onboarding/account-details') }, 2000 ); } return ( <>

EMPLOYMENT DETAILS

{/*

We hate to ask, but regulations mandate us to.
Your BVN is safe with us!

*/} {submitted? <>

Sent successfully

Employment details created successfully

: <>
{/*

Please fill out this field.

*/}
}
) } export default Employment;
